indicator_name: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 9.c: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 9.c.1: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
SDG_GOAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Target 9.c: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 9.c.1: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
SOURCE_TYPE: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
REC_USE_LIM: This data represents the United Kingdom as a whole, as opposed to Liverpool. Since disaggregation was not available at the local level and because UK data is near to 100%, this has been extrapolated to assume Liverpool's mobile coverage is similar.
